text_block_list.text: After training with Hokko Tarumae. As usual, we were discussing our schedule of races and locodol activities.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Actually, I'm thinking of holding some events other than street performances.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I would like to consider ways to convey the charm of Tomakomai and attract more customers.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: First we need to get the word out to a lot of people…… what do you think Trainer?
An event that can raise awareness. It is essential that the event has the ability to attract a large number of visitors. Speaking of events that can attract a lot of people…
choice_data_list: How about going to a music festival!
How about we go to a music festival!

text_block_list.text: The more the population of the audience grows, the more people will be interested in Hokko Tarumae.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… The music festival that trainer is talking about is a big event with a lot of famous artists and idols, right?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I think it is tough.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: To be on such a stage, it is essential to have a proven track record and popularity in the entertainment industry.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It's hard for a local locodol with no track record and no credibility to be allowed to appear on the stage.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Besides, even if we were able to participate in a festival, the festival-goers are there to listen to the artists' songs.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It is difficult to get such people interested in Tomakomai. That is why you have to have an influence backed by a proven track record and popularity.
I was naive. How to increase the number of visitors to Tomakomai, a good idea is not going to come so easily.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Hmmm…… I think I'll leave it at that for today and reconsider. Thanks for taking the time to discuss this with me!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: An event that attracts visitors and gets them interested in Tomakomai.…… I knew it would be hard to come up with―.
Good! With this dance performance, you're going to win the world, aren't you? You'll be on TV and become a big star in no time!
No, no, no, the TV industry is not that easy. You need not only talent, but also luck and hard work.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (Yes, yes. The industry is very tough―)
Eeeeh～ Don't be so serious there! You're such a downer! You're always like that!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Festival-goers come to hear the artists sing.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It is difficult to get such people interested in Tomakomai. That is why you have to have an influence backed by a proven track record and popularity.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Maybe that one earlier was also…… too serious ……?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Oh, by the way…… trainer, make a troubled face. I think she was hurt by my seriousness, too―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (The trainer liked Tomakomai.)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (They are very supportive of my desire to make Tomakomai a better place and said they would work with me to make it happen. ……)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ― and yet I'm so rude ……!
On my way back to my room, I saw Hokko Tarumae standing there look like she is waititng someone. I walked up to her to see what was wrong.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Oh…… um, trainer.…… Uh, that, good work today……!
I was just about to think a plan for an event to be hosted in regards to the plan I mentioned earlier. Since I'm here, I'll let her know about it.
choice_data_list: Tarumae, about what we talk about earlier―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……! I'm sorry!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Well, I am always grateful for the support of the street live activities, and that alone is enough for me……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: So, I'll be fine! It's enough if we can continue to do this kind of steady street live performance! Excuse me!
…… Indeed, organizing event is hard. Does it mean that live street activity is the most solid path?
As she said, I would like to support her steady activities and learn more about community development.
